Class WaterUsageMonitor

java.lang.Object
WaterUsageMonitor
public class WaterUsageMonitor extends Object
Central monitoring system for water usage management. Coordinates all water meter operations, usage tracking, and alert generation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WaterUsageMonitor()
    Creates a new water usage monitoring system.

  • Method Details

    • addUsageRecord

      public void addUsageRecord(String meterID, LocalDate date, double amount)
      Adds a new usage record to the system.
      Parameters:
      meterID - the water meter ID
      date - the date of usage
      amount - the amount of water used

    • checkForAbnormalUsage

      public boolean checkForAbnormalUsage(String meterID)
      Checks for abnormal usage patterns and generates alerts if needed.
      Parameters:
      meterID - the meter ID to check
      Returns:
      true if abnormal usage detected, false otherwise

    • generateReport

      public Report generateReport(String meterID, String period)
      Generates a usage report for a specific meter and period.
      Parameters:
      meterID - the meter ID
      period - description of the report period
      Returns:
      generated usage report

    • getUsageHistory

      public List<UsageRecord> getUsageHistory(String meterID, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves usage history for a specific meter within a date range.
      Parameters:
      meterID - the meter ID
      startDate - start date of the range
      endDate - end date of the range
      Returns:
      list of usage records within the specified range

    • bindMeterToUser

      public boolean bindMeterToUser(String userID, String meterID)
      Binds a meter to a user for access control.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID
      meterID - the meter ID to bind
      Returns:
      true if binding successful, false otherwise
